full_text: Pedro Castillo’s presidency has been defined by his political inexperience and indecision, the extremism and infighting of his allies and his weak mandate  https://t.co/g48QScnPqB

localize.full_text: ペドロ・カスティージョの大統領職は、彼の政治的経験のなさと優柔不断さ、同盟国の過激さと内紛、そして弱い支持率によって定義されています https://t.co/g48QScnPqB。
